DOC.brief_summary: The China-Anhui Birth Cohort Study ( C-ABCS ) set examine delay , cumulative interactive effect maternal environmental exposure birth outcome child 's development . The C-ABCS recruit pregnant woman six major city Anhui province , China , November 2008 October 2010 . A range data ( include demographic , obstetric , occupational , nutritional psychosocial factor ) collect interviews laboratory test . In trimester , woman 's blood sample draw , pregnancy complication abstract physician 's medical record . By end 2011 , birth outcomes/birth defect observed/identified clinician within 12 month delivery 11 421 singleton live birth six city outcomes among remain 2033 live birth still observe . In addition , 4668 child Ma'anshan city follow pre-school period till reach adolescence obtain data familial environmental exposure well child 's physical , psychological , behavioural sexual development .
